topics.body:
In personal news I only have two weeks left of laser hair removal until I don't need to do this shit anymore.

I can see why people don't get laser hair removal that often cause this shit burns like fucking crazy.

I still need to do two more face waxing and putting the epilatory cream and then I can move on to other stuff.  The reason why I haven't been able to fulltime mtf yet like I've wanted is that I used to be extremely hairy.  It took six months of essentially using a laser that burns your skin to get rid of my body hair.

Tl:dr; holy shit am I glad to be almost done with this.

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557cb86863687217b0000776#post_557cb86863687217b0000776
If you do it yourself with a home laser hair removal kit not really; it's just incredibly incredibly time consuming.
2 to 3 hours per session X 2 sessions per week X on average there is 4 weeks per month X 2 to 6 months depending on how hairy you are.

A home laser hair removal kit will run you about $100.

At minimum we're talking about 30 hours total, but if you're very hairy it can take hundreds of hours total.
